title: Nossa Senhora da Fátima
body: At the site of Pico do Galo, in the parish of Câmara de Lobos, Father António de Abreu Vieira founded a chapel of this invocation, which was consecrated on October 11, 1931, with donations collected in the parish.

Pico do Galo: Locality on the island of Madeira
Câmara de Lobos: Locality on the island of Madeira

1931: Year of the consecration of the chapel
